main.name: Elias Weinraub
main.description: Brooklyn-based frontend engineer, working primarily with React and Javsacript to develop beautiful web apps. Check out some of my work below!
main.bio: Born and raised in Brooklyn, NY. Former news guy, avid hiker, fluent Spanish speaker, entirely self-taught developer.

resume.skillmessage: My current tech stack is mainly comprised of:

education.degree: Bachelors of Science in Philosophy-Neuroscience-Psychology, Anthropology, and History, Graduate with Honors
National Merit Scholar, Graduate with Honors

work.title: Language Instructor
work.description: Taught English to Spanish high school students. Developed a curriculum that blended grammatical instruction with conversational skill-building exercises.

work.title: Product Associate
work.description: Created and improved materials for online lesson plans for Writable, a digital platform that helps schools teach writing to students. Identified and licensed material for use in Writable’s curriculum.

work.title: Business Development Lead
work.description: Served as sole, independent business development lead for GoBambino, an app created for parents to search and book a variety of children’s activities. Added 200+ new vendors, tripling the size of vendor base.

work.title: Sales Associate
work.description: Conducted sales for SelfMade, a company that provides digital marketing and social media management to ecommerce businesses. Consistently exceeded revenue targets with $30k+ in total sales.

work.title: Broadcast Associate
work.description: Pitched, produced and edited news stories for broadcast news programs and digital platforms. Managed Evening News social media accounts.

projects.title: Loops by Emily
projects.category: Mock e-comm site for a friend's quarantine business
